title: Updates cause my Start screen on start to change to bing.com
content: Whenever there's an update after I turn on my computer and go onto Firefox my start page is changed from what I had it last to Bing.com. I don't know what causes it all I'm sure of is that either Mozilla Updates or Windows Updates cause it because before then Firefox works fine.
creator: erikb1109

title: fire fox my home page
